blogPost.excerpt: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
blogPost.body: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
blogPost.title: The Work From Home Backdrop - Physical backdrop for video calls and Zoom meetings
blogPost.author: Samuel alex

localize.description: 糟糕的背景是否意味着你的视频通话、虚拟约会和缩放会议让团队失望了？你的虚拟背景没有给人留下深刻印象吗？在家工作背景只需几秒钟即可安装，并立即将您的空间转变为动态域。
localize.tagline: 视频通话和缩放会议的物理背景

localize.description: 糟糕的背景是否意味着你的視頻通話、虛擬約會和縮放會議讓團隊失望了？你的虛擬背景沒有給人留下深刻印象嗎？在家工作背景只需幾秒鐘即可安裝，並立即將您的空間轉變爲動態域。
localize.tagline: 視頻通話和縮放會議的物理背景

previous.excerpt: The best way to help save local businesses is getting more people in the door. Delight is the simplest way to tell a friend about a business. - Find your favorite spot, send the link to a friend and we'll donate money to that business when they check it out.
previous.title: Delight - Support local businesses by referring friends

localize.description: 帮助拯救当地企业的最好方法是让更多的人进来。高兴是告诉朋友关于生意的最简单的方式。-找到你最喜欢的地方，将链接发送给朋友，当他们查看时，我们将向该企业捐款。
localize.tagline: 通过推荐朋友来支持当地企业

localize.description: 幫助拯救當地企業的最好方法是讓更多的人進來。高興是告訴朋友關於生意的最簡單的方式。-找到你最喜歡的地方，將鏈接發送給朋友，當他們查看時，我們將向該企業捐款。
localize.tagline: 通過推薦朋友來支持當地企業

next.excerpt: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Let’s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
next.title: Roadtrip - Good tunes, good friends, good vibes.

localize.description: 举办一个聆听派对，和朋友一起闲逛，或者结识新朋友，一起听好音乐，一起建立播放列表。让我们把互联网弄得安静一点。过来打个招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲调，好的朋友，好的共鸣。

localize.description: 舉辦一個聆聽派對，和朋友一起閒逛，或者結識新朋友，一起聽好音樂，一起建立播放列表。讓我們把互聯網弄得安靜一點。過來打個招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲調，好的朋友，好的共鳴。
